column3: News;PHNOM PENH: One of  two bag snatchers was nabbed after a Honda they were riding crashed after a botched street robbery.------According to police
column4: the suspects tried to grab a woman’s bag at 2:30 pm on September 5
column6: at the main market of Tuol Sangke. ------Witnesses said that the victim resisted
column7: causing the pair to take a tumble. The one boy was put under citizens arrest
column8: while other legged it. The suspect and motorbikes were taken to the police station at Tuol Sangke 1 for shackling
